entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
